com.larkwoodlabs.service.protocol.rest
Class RequestException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.larkwoodlabs.service.protocol.rest.MessageException
              com.larkwoodlabs.service.protocol.rest.RequestException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class RequestException
extends MessageException

An exception used to report recoverable errors that occur while handling an RTSP request. An RTSP exception carries a StatusCode and error message that can be sent in an RTSP response.

Author:
Gregory Bumgardner
See Also:
Serialized Form

RequestException

public RequestException(ProtocolVersion protocolVersion,
                        Status status)
Constructs a request exception from the specified protocol version and status.

Parameters:
protocolVersion - - The ProtocolVersion of the bad request.
status - - The Status code to be reported by the exception.

                        Status status,
                        String message)

status - - The Status code to be reported by the exception.
message - - A descriptive error message.

public RequestException(ProtocolVersion protocolVersion,
                        Status status,
                        Throwable cause)
Constructs a request exception from the specified protocol version, status and Throwable cause.

Parameters:
protocolVersion - - The ProtocolVersion of the bad request.
status - - The Status code to be reported by the exception.
cause - - A Throwable representing the root cause for the exception.

createResponse

public Response createResponse(Connection connection)
Constructs a Response object from this exception. An entity containing an error message and stack trace will be added to the response if an error message or Throwable cause is specified when this exception was constructed.

setResponse

public void setResponse(Response response)
Uses the status and any error message or Throwable cause associated with this exception to set the status and entity of the specified Response.

Parameters:
response - - The response that is to be modified to report the error described by this exception.
